title: Freelo Champions
body: I feel like the latest couple of patches have created way too many freelo champs, we almost need an extra 2 bans each to deal with them, has riot just stopped trying to balance the game or something?

replies.body: we've needed an extra 2 bans for a while now.

................................. that doesn't even make sense.

if so many champs are so strong, then they cancel each other out.


and to make it even worse, you are bronze... bronze players only play champions at about 3-10% of what they are capable of anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=Geldour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bRf6wAl8,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2014-12-15T08:56:04.610+0000)
> ................................. that doesn't even make sense.
> 
> if so many champs are so strong, then they cancel each other out.
> 
> 
> and to make it even worse, you are bronze... bronze players only play champions at about 3-10% of what they are capable of anyway.

B1 > S3 in 3 days.
Played Thresh with a duo Tristana.

Rekt lane.

Won game.
Can we do a LoLDox? Grab his rank, laugh at his rank, disregard his comment and move on?
so what happens when both sides pick a freelo champ?
Basically the winner at the moment is the team with the most freelo champs.
No. The winner is the better team :)
It's preseason the whole point of preseason is to adjust the changes to the game to balance out the champions who become op next season it will be better once they work out all the numbers and stuff.
Good decision, break everything, then start fixing it, to distract people from the countless other things that have never been fixed about the game.
